name: Extract URLs' hyperlinks  (simplified)
description: Fetches HTML from URLs, parses it, and extracts hyperlinks. (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

list_of_urls.name: list_of_urls
list_of_urls.info: List of retrieved URLs from a search engine to extract hyperlinks from

code.value:
import requests
import html2text
from loguru import logger
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
from typing import List

from axiestudio.schema import Data
from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.schema.dotdict import dotdict
from axiestudio.io import DataInput, DropdownInput, IntInput, MessageTextInput, NestedDictInput, Output
from axiestudio.template import Output

class HyperlinksExtractor(Component):
    display_name = "Extract hyperlinks from URLs (simplified)"
    description = "Fetches HTML from URLs, parses it, and extracts hyperlinks."
    icon = "file-code"

    inputs = [
        DataInput(
            name="list_of_urls",
            display_name="Search results with URLs",
            info="List of retrieved URLs from a search engine to extract hyperlinks from",
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Hyperlinks", name="extracted_hyperlinks", method="extract_hyperlinks"),
    ]

    def extract_hyperlinks(self) -> List[Data]:
        list_of_urls: List[Data] = self.list_of_urls
        hyperlinks = []
        
        for result in list_of_urls:
            url = result.link

            # 1. Extract HTML from the response
            response = requests.get(url)
            html_content = response.text

            # 2. Parse the HTML
            soup = BeautifulSoup(html_content, 'html.parser')
            
            # 3. Extract the links from the given URL
            hyperlinks += ([Data(hyperlink=link.get('href'), original=url) for link in soup.find_all('a')])
        return hyperlinks
code.name: code

node.description: Fetches HTML from URLs, parses it, and extracts hyperlinks.

    display_name = "Extract hyperlinks from URLs (simplified)"

    inputs = [
        DataInput(

    def extract_hyperlinks(self) -> List[Data]:

            response = requests.get(url)
